title: Robbie Robertson, The Band co-founder, songwriter and guitarist, dead at 80
description: Robbie Robertson, the singer and songwriter best remembered as the lead guitarist and songwriter for the seminal rock group The Band, has died at age 80.

title: 41 people dead after boat capsized off Italian coast, survivors tell Red Cross
description: Forty-one people died in a shipwreck close to the Italian island of Lampedusa on Friday, survivors told the deputy general secretary of the Red Cross.

title: Robbie Robertson, The Band co-founder, songwriter and guitarist, dead at 80
description: Robbie Robertson, the singer and songwriter best remembered as the lead guitarist and songwriter for the seminal rock group The Band, has died at age 80.

title: WATCH:  Toddler sings along with grandpa as he plays guitar
description: Cameron, who is now 8, had an adorable jam session with his grandpa in this throwback video.

title: Maui wildfires live updates: At least 6 dead as residents scramble to evacuate
description: Fierce winds and drought conditions are causing major wildfires on Maui.

title: When will gas prices stop rising? Experts weigh in
description: The average price of a gallon of gas has risen more than 8% over the last month.

title: A lawsuit accuses a Georgia doctor of decapitating a baby during delivery
description: A lawsuit accuses a Georgia doctor of using too much force and decapitating a woman’s baby after it became stuck during delivery

title: Child wounded when shots fired into home; 3rd shooting of a child in St. Louis
description: This is the third shooting involving a child this week in the St. Louis area.

title: GOP donor Anton Lazzaro sentenced to 21 years for sex trafficking minors in Minnesota
description: A formerly well-connected GOP donor convicted of giving teenage girls gifts, alcohol and money in exchange for sex has been sentenced to 21 years in prison on sex trafficking charges in Minnesota

title: Michigan mom is charged with buying guns for son who threatened top Democrats, prosecutors say
description: A Michigan woman is facing federal charges for lying when she purchased firearms later found in her son's possession

title: Ex-Georgia man sought in alleged misuse of millions of Christian ministry donations
description: Federal authorities are seeking a former Georgia man in alleged misuse of more than $30 million donated by religious groups and individuals for ministry in China

title: Amazon-owned subscription-based health clinic begins opening new locations across US
description: Amazon's One Medical, a subscription-based primary care provider, has begun opening new locations across the U.S. since the tech giant acquired the company.

title: WATCH:  Dog hilariously flies through the air trying to catch water from hose
description: We’re channeling this energy for the rest of the summer.

title: Ex-Las Vegas Raider Henry Ruggs sentenced to prison for fatal DUI crash in Nevada
description: Former Las Vegas Raiders player Henry Ruggs has been sentenced to at least three years in a Nevada prison for killing a woman in a fiery crash while driving his sports car drunk at speeds up to 156 mph on a city street nearly two years ago

title: Man who posted threats toward President Biden killed during FBI raid
description: The raid was in connection with an investigation into alleged threats against President Joe Biden and others, according to two officials briefed on the case.

title: 11 dead after fire at vacation home for people with disabilities: Report
description: Eleven people are dead after a fire engulfed a vacation home for people with disabilities in eastern France on Wednesday morning, officials said.

title: WATCH:  Hawaii wildfires destroy buildings and prompt multiple evacuations
description: Ferocious wildfires in Hawaii have burned over 1,800 acres across Maui and the Big Island, burning down structures and prompting multiple evacuations.

title: Jack Smith previously got search warrant for Trump's Twitter, new court docs show
description: Jack Smith obtained a search warrant for records and data from Trump's Twitter account earlier this year, newly revealed court documents show

title: Clinic files for bankruptcy following $6 million judgment over false asbestos claims
description: The clinic was forced to pay for submitting hundreds of false asbestos claims.

title: Storms lead to unprecedented $34B in insured losses so far this year, Swiss Re says
description: Waves of severe thunderstorms in the U.S. led to $34 billion in insured losses.

title: IKEA to open store in downtown San Francisco this month, defying retail exodus
description: IKEA moves forward despite nearby closures at Whole Foods, Old Navy and Nordstrom.

title: Dianne Feinstein at home after brief hospitalization for fall, her office says
description: Sen. Dianne Feinstein is at home following fall, her office says.

title: American woman, child freed after being kidnapped in Haiti last month
description: Alix Dorsainvil was kidnapped from the ministry where she worked.

title: A Finnish man places 26.5 pounds of dynamite in a friend's vehicles and claims it was a joke
description: A Finnish man reportedly stored 12 kilograms (26_5 pounds) of dynamite in two cars belonging to a friend, saying it “was a joke.”

title: 3-month-old dies after being left in hot car in Houston, police say
description: A baby boy died in Houston on Tuesday after being left in a car amid a dangerous and unrelenting heat wave, police said.

title: WATCH:  Woman turns home into clinic for ailing hummingbirds
description: This woman has transformed her Mexico City apartment into a clinic for dozens of ailing hummingbirds.

title: Red Cross implements FDA policy allowing more gay and bisexual men to donate blood
description: More gay and bisexual men will be able to donate blood after the Red Cross announced Monday it would follow recent guidelines from the U.S. Food and Drug Administration.

title: NYC doctor allegedly drugged, assaulted women, prosecutors say
description: A New York City doctor has been charged with dozens of new counts accusing him of drugging the women he allegedly raped and filmed, prosecutors in New York announced.

title: 2nd arrest made in connection with death of missing mother of 4
description: Donell Anderson was charged with multiple counts of murder in the death of his wife Imani Roberson, police said. His brother has also been charged in her disappearance.
